scripts.db:real: sqlite3 -header -column trades_real.db "SELECT id, substr(market_slug, 1, 25) as market, side, printf('$%.2f', entry_price) as entry, printf('$%.2f', exit_price) as exit, printf('%.1f', shares) as shares, status, printf('$%.2f', pnl) as pnl, substr(created_at, 1, 16) as time FROM trades ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 20; SELECT ''; SELECT 'TOTAL PnL: $' || printf('%.2f', SUM(pnl)) FROM trades;"
scripts.db:paper: sqlite3 -header -column trades_paper_normal.db "SELECT id, substr(market_slug, 1, 25) as market, side, printf('$%.2f', entry_price) as entry, printf('$%.2f', exit_price) as exit, printf('%.1f', shares) as shares, status, printf('$%.2f', pnl) as pnl, substr(created_at, 1, 16) as time FROM trades ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 20; SELECT ''; SELECT 'TOTAL PnL: $' || printf('%.2f', SUM(pnl)) FROM trades;"
scripts.db:paper:optimized: sqlite3 -header -column trades_paper_optimized.db "SELECT id, substr(market_slug, 1, 25) as market, side, printf('$%.2f', entry_price) as entry, printf('$%.2f', exit_price) as exit, printf('%.1f', shares) as shares, status, printf('$%.2f', pnl) as pnl, substr(created_at, 1, 16) as time FROM trades ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 20; SELECT ''; SELECT 'TOTAL PnL: $' || printf('%.2f', SUM(pnl)) FROM trades;"
scripts.db:stats:real: sqlite3 trades_real.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as wins, SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as losses, printf('%.1f%%', 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(CASE WHEN pnl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)) as win_rate, printf('$%.2f', SUM(pnl)) as total_pnl FROM trades;"
scripts.db:stats:paper: sqlite3 trades_paper_normal.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as wins, SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as losses, printf('%.1f%%', 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(CASE WHEN pnl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)) as win_rate, printf('$%.2f', SUM(pnl)) as total_pnl FROM trades;"
scripts.db:stats:paper:optimized: sqlite3 trades_paper_optimized.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as wins, SUM(CASE WHEN pnl < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as losses, printf('%.1f%%', 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN pnl > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(CASE WHEN pnl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)) as win_rate, printf('$%.2f', SUM(pnl)) as total_pnl FROM trades;"
scripts.db:reset:real: rm -f trades_real.db && echo 'Real trading DB reset'
scripts.db:reset:paper: rm -f trades_paper_normal.db && echo 'Paper normal DB reset'
scripts.db:reset:paper:optimized: rm -f trades_paper_optimized.db && echo 'Paper optimized DB reset'
